pathaia.semantic package¶

Submodules¶

pathaia.semantic.segmentation module¶

A module to produce semantic segmentations.

Can be used visualize model perception of an image.

coarse(image, model)¶

Compute a coarse semantic segmentation of an image.

Place a window on every pixel, pixel value in segmentation is its prediction (by a model) made on the window.

Parameters

  • image (ndarray) – an image.

  • model (pathaia model) – a ml model.

Returns

segmentation of the given image.

Return type

ndarray

pathaia.semantic.util module¶

Useful functions for semantic analysis.

unlabeled_regular_grid_list(shape, step)¶

Get a regular grid of position on a slide given its dimensions.

Parameters

  • shape (-) – tuple, (i, j) shape of the window to tile.

  • step (-) – int, steps between patch samples.

Yields

- positions – tuples, (i, j) positions on a regular grid.
